Package de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen

Interface Summary
ISysSplashScreen This interface has to be implemented to create a splash screen using the factory class FSysSplashScreen.
ISysStartInterruptable A class that implements this interface shows that it can be closed when the splash screen is closed by the user to stop starting the application.
 

Class Summary
FSysSplashScreen Interface for building splash screens based on a progress development.
 

Exception Summary
CSysSplashScreenException Thrown by services.
